scripts.fuckin:go: npm i && npm run schema && npm run migrate && npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.testseeders: NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate && NODE_ENV=test npm run seed && NODE_ENV=test npm run undoseed
scripts.migrate: cd src && npx sequelize db:migrate && cd ..
scripts.spinup: npm run migrate && npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.migrate:prod: cd out && npx sequelize db:migrate && cd ..
scripts.spinup:dev: npm run migrate && npm run dev
scripts.spinup:prod: npm run migrate:prod && npm run start
scripts.mentorSeed: NODE_ENV=development cd src && npx sequelize db:seed 20201208095752-mentors.js
scripts.seed: cd src && npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all && cd ..
scripts.undoseed: cd src && npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all && cd ..
scripts.schema: cd src && npx sequelize db:create && cd ..
scripts.seed:prod: cd out && npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all && cd ..
scripts.fetch: cd src && npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
